I'm neither adding the module to an EAR, nor adding support for annotated Java
classes, nor using a flexible project structure.  I've selected Servlet 2.3 with
a Tomcat 5.0.29 server.
It only happens now and then after changing the Servlet level and EAR settings.

Unable to reproduce in current I builds.  Please reopen with detailed recreation
steps if you are still seeing this.
Thanks
Changed Version field given new release numbering.

Seen repeatedly with I200506280501 after creating a Apache Tomcat 5.0.29 server
as a 2.3 module from the new Dynamic Web Project wizard.  The wizard then
refuses to complete arguing that a project by that name already exists.  The
project that was created does not appear under the Dynamic Web Projects category
in the common navigator, only under Other Projects.

Changing to blocker. I can't finish creating a Dynamic Web Project anymore.

Please provide detailed steps to reproduce.  
Are you in flexible mode?
In what order to you make the changes in teh wizard?
Also can you reproduce in windows?
With out this information this defect is still not reproducable on our end

It's a fresh workspace, so the Flexible preference is off.  When I open the
wizard, I type in the project name "DynamicWebProject" and then choose Tomcat
5.0 and switch the Module Version to 2.3.

Not touching the module version and leaving it at 2.4 allows me to at least
complete the wizard.  If I don't have a server defined anywhere, modifying the
module version makes the "New" button to define a server not work, either.

Derek, I did some debugging of my own and found that the
DataModelSyncHelper.setProperty(String, Object) method is responding to changes
in the module version combo box and setting the
IJ2EEComponentCreationDataModelProperties.COMPONENT_VERSION property to a
String.  I haven't been able to narrow it down to a problem in the descriptor or
just platform-specific behavior in the Combo widget.
Jason sending your way as we'll need to look at this in Linux.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 93290 ***
Verified as fixed in I200507140320.  Closing.
